hero.title: Empowering Volunteers, Enriching Lives
hero.description: Join our community to make a real difference. Connect, contribute, and grow through meaningful volunteering opportunities.

features.title: The platform makes volunteering accessible, organized, and impactful for everyone involved.

smartScheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
smartScheduling.desc: Easily browse and sign up for volunteer opportunities that fit your schedule.

personalizedMatching.title: Personalized Matching
personalizedMatching.desc: Find opportunities that match your skills, interests, and availability. Make every hour count.

mobileFriendly.title: Mobile Friendly
mobileFriendly.desc: Access your volunteer dashboard anywhere. Confirm attendance, check schedules, and stay connected on the go.

achievements.title: Achievement System
achievements.desc: Earn badges and recognition for your volunteer work. Celebrate milestones and inspire others to get involved.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive care and support services designed to enhance quality of life

medical.title: 24-Hour Medical and Nursing Care
medical.desc: Provided by the home's skilled staff, including consultations with specialist doctors.

social.title: Social Services
social.desc: Offers support to residents and their families, maintains connections with the community and schools, and initiates special activities.

cultural.title: Cultural Activities
cultural.desc: Animal therapy, gardening, weekly Torah portion study, music classes, exercise, ceramics, jewelry and bead making, guest artist performances, trips, and parties.

projects.title: Special Projects: Growing Community
projects.desc: Strengthening connections between residents and staff through meaningful community-building initiatives.

volunteers.title: Volunteers
volunteers.desc: Schools, pre-military programs, retirees, and neighbors assist with both group and individual activities.

therapy.title: Occupational Therapy
therapy.desc: Includes a Snoezelen room (multi-sensory stimulation) and cognitive groups for enhanced well-being.

employment.title: Employment and Social Activities
employment.desc: Handicrafts, music engagement, classes, computer room, music room, cultural performances, and more.

physio.title: Physiotherapy
physio.desc: Personalized individual and group therapy in a well-equipped facility and an activity yard.

meals.title: Five Meals a Day
meals.desc: Supervised by a dietitian and under rabbinical supervision for optimal nutrition and kosher compliance.

tv.title: Cable TV Connection
tv.desc: Option to install cable television in residents' rooms for entertainment and connection.

cleaning.title: Cleaning and Security Services
cleaning.desc: Comprehensive cleaning and 24/7 security services to ensure a safe and comfortable environment.

laundry.title: Laundry Services
laundry.desc: Professional laundry services to maintain residents' clothing and linens with care.

beauty.title: Hair Salon and Pedicure
beauty.desc: On-site beauty services including hair styling and pedicure treatments for resident comfort.

synagogue.title: Synagogue
synagogue.desc: On-site synagogue facilities for prayer services and religious observance.

pharmacy.title: Pharmacy
pharmacy.desc: Convenient on-site pharmacy services for medication management and prescription needs.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team. We're here to help and answer any questions you may have.
